title: Leading export markets of champagne from France 2017
summary: The United_Kingdom was the world 's France export markets Number by a distance in 2017 , with a bottles of 27.76 millions .
To give this figure some context , USA was second in the ranking valued at 23.1 millions , substantially lower in bottles than that of the United_Kingdom .
Many of the world 's France export champagne come from the United_Kingdom .
gold: During the year 2017 , the total champagne exports from France to the United Kingdom amounted to about 27 millions of 75 cl . bottles . The UK is the first export market for French champagne .
